This is fastXPath exception. Please open TPTP defect.


------- Additional Comment #4 From Peter Kim 2006-05-30 16:40 EST -------

TPTP Bugzilla: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=144545


------- Additional Comment #5 From Malcom Zung 2006-05-31 09:51 EST -------

TPTP has rejected the bugzilla we opened because it involves IBM code.  Praful 
states that this problem is in FastXPath code which is part of TPTP, but the 
problem can only be triggered by IBM code.
